reasoning: Adult-onset form of X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy. Overall X-ALD incidence ~1 in 17,000 males (0.6 per 100k), AMN represents approximately 50% of cases. Estimated at ~0.3 per 100k. Limited population-based registry data.
source: Bezman L et al. (2001). Adrenoleukodystrophy: incidence, new mutation rate, and results of extended family screening. Ann Neurol. 49(4):512-7
